title: NintendoShop
description: This app was made using React with redux and thunk on the front end. On back end it is using SpringBoot/NodeJS.
summary: Presents an online shop for buying Nintendo related products.

title: NewsDaily
description: This app was made using React with redux and thunk on the front end. The user can view and read news in different countries
summary: Presents an site for showing the latest news.

title: Green Earth
description: This site was made mainly for studying and learning the latest css layouts.
summary: Present a brochure site using the latest css layouts grid and flexbox.
